text: Can you retry with a more recent release? IIRC, there have been some fixes in this area in the time since 3.10 came out
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: No response for some time and this is likely fixed in newer release, setting to WORKSFORME for now, please reopen with a sample code and files if you can still reproduce this with the latest version of POI (currently 3.13).
Thanks Nick Burch for the suggestion, I replaced the legacy jars with the latest ones and is working fine with the new one.
creator: mahesh49942@gmail.com
